story_galar_01_09000/2401_1001_0100_10: Team Yell is here to cheer for Piers!
story_galar_01_09000/2401_1001_0300_10: You’ve got a passionate group of fans, as usual.
story_galar_01_09000/2401_1001_0400_10: Ah, sorry. These lot just care a lot for the team.
story_galar_01_09000/2401_1001_0500_10:
So it seems Chairman Rose is trying to
compete with us...
story_galar_01_09000/2401_1001_0600_10:
by hosting events with Pokémon battles in
large venues.
story_galar_01_09000/2401_1001_0700_10: We’ve lost quite a bit of our audience to him, too.
story_galar_01_09000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Nevertheless, there wasn’t anything strange about
the application itself.
story_galar_01_09000/2401_1001_1000_10:
We can’t reject an application based on who the
applicant is.
story_galar_01_09000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Victor has joined one of Rose’s events for us,
just in case...
